patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -8,9 +8,9 @@
       - redis-data:/data
     command: redis-server --appendonly yes --requirepass imchat2024
     restart: unless-stopped
     healthcheck:
-      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "-a", "imchat2024", "--raw", "incr", "ping"]
+     test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "-a", "imchat2024", "PING"]
       interval: 10s
       timeout: 3s
       retries: 5

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
services:
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: im-redis
    ports:
      - "6379:6379"
    volumes:
      - redis-data:/data
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes --requirepass imchat2024
    restart: unless-stopped
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "-a", "imchat2024", "--raw", "incr", "ping"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 3s
      retries: 5

volumes:
  redis-data:
    driver: local
